commitResults.messageBody:
Changes to be committed:
	modified:   src/main/java/Duke.java

UserInterface handles user input from stdin and executes commands.
Entering "bye" exits the program.
Entering anything else echoes that command to stdout.
Added basic documentation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1: Implement add and list functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented addTask(String), which adds a task inputted by the user to
an ArrayList. This is now the default behaviour of the bot, if the
command inputted does not match any other commands.
Implemented printTasks(), which prints all stored tasks to stdout.
echo() still exists, but is obsolete and unused.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 3: Add mark and unmark functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented the Task class to represent tasks and modified UserInterface
to make use of it.

Simplified documentation for several functions.

Renamed startup() to greeting() to avoid confusion with start().

Added null checks and try-catch blocks to functions with parameters.

Removed the obsolete echo() function.
Modified code to fit coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodingStandard: Modify code to fit coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed exit() to printGoodbye() to avoid confusion, as
printGoodbye() does not actually exit the program.

Simplified documentation.

Renamed startup() to printGreeting() to avoid confusion with start().

Switch indentation has been changed to follow Coding Standard. Switch
and case statements now have the same indentation.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality: Refactor code to improve quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed redundant documentation.

Changed String "mode" to "taskType" for clarity.
